title: Rangnick: 'We scored three goals' | Merson: A bad result for Man Utd
shortDescription: Ralf Rangnick admitted his Man Utd side were not good enough after they slipped out of the Premier League top four with a 1-1 draw at Burnley.

shortDescription: The Premier League is back with a full midweek fixture list and Jones Knows has you covered for insight, analysis, score predictions and best bets.

title: EFL highlights, round-up: Fulham, Derby win; Sunderland lose again
shortDescription: Aleksandar Mitrovic scored twice as Sky Bet Championship leaders Fulham beat Millwall 3-0, while Derby revived their unlikely survival push with a 3-1 win over Hull.

shortDescription: Highlights of the Championship match between Derby County and Hull City.

title: Luton maintain play-off push by beating Barnsley
shortDescription: Luton continued their climb towards the Championship play-offs as they heaped further misery on bottom side Barnsley with a 2-1 victory.

title: Stoke cruise past 10-man Swans
shortDescription: Birthday boy Jaden Philogene-Bidace inspired Stoke's 3-0 Championship victory against 10-man Swansea.

title: Mitro edges nearer Championship record in Fulham cruise
shortDescription: Fulham increased their advantage at the top of the Championship with a 3-0 win over London neighbours Millwall.

title: Coventry hit back to hold Blackpool
shortDescription: Coventry were held to a frustrating 1-1 draw by Blackpool at the Coventry Building Society Arena.

title: Derby beat Hull to revive survival push
shortDescription: Derby took another step on the road to a great escape in the Championship when they beat Hull 3-1 at Pride Park.

shortDescription: Team news, stats and how to follow the Scottish Premiership on Sky Sports ahead of a busy midweek round, including Aberdeen vs Celtic, Rangers vs Hibs.

title: Man Utd drop out of top four with draw at Burnley
shortDescription: Manchester United dropped out of the top four after bottom club Burnley came from behind to draw 1-1 at Turf Moor.

title: Howe: ASM at his magical best | Lampard: We will have more nights like this
shortDescription: Eddie Howe described Allan Saint-Maximin's man-of-the-match display against Everton as "magical", while Frank Lampard said the Frenchman was "unplayable".

title: Bowen edges West Ham past Watford as Zouma plays full match
shortDescription: Jarrod Bowen's deflected winner plunged Watford deeper into relegation trouble as Kurt Zouma played in a 1-0 win for West Ham.
